{
    "name": "Bardeen-Horowitz Metric for Rotating Stars",
    "abbrev": "bardeenhorowitz",
    "description": "The Bardeen-Horowitz metric describes the spacetime around a rotating star, taking into account the effects of general relativity and the star's angular momentum.",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Spherical",
            "xlineElement": "-dt^2 + (1-2M/r - (r^2\*J^2)/(4*r^3)) * ddr^2 + (r^2\*J^2)/(4*r^3) * sin^2(dth^2) + r^2 * (dph^2)",
            "validated": false
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": [
        "christoffels",
        "ricci",
        "riemann",
        "einstein",
        "weyl",
        "g00",
        "infiniteRedShift",
        "horizons",
        "singularities",
        "limits"
    ],
    "diagrams": []
}[0m
